general_info.summary: This text appears to be a list of various sections, programs, and services offered by or related to Sharda University. It covers academic aspects like sample papers, global knowledge seekers, and courses on human values, as well as administrative and support functions such as recruiters, banking services, accommodation, visa guidelines, and COVID-19 updates. The list also includes initiatives for capacity development, skill enhancement, innovation, entrepreneurship, and references to specific portals and programs like Paramarsh and the National Cyber Crime Reporting Portal.
